subject: p10715477
Findings: Right internal jugular sheath ends at upper SVC. A single mediastinal drain tube is present on the right side. The appearance of the post operative widened mediastinum is unchanged since. Bilateral, confluent, lung opacities suggesting moderate pulmonary edema has improved asymmetrically on the left side, but unchanged on the right. Pleural effusions, if any, is mild bilaterally.
